commits.message:
EUCA-13319 Instances can boot before network is ready.

Description:
 - strstr search string is not specific enough when looking for
   IP addresses in euca-dhcpd.conf. This causes a false positive
   if an existing instance is a superstring of the new instance:
   existing: 10.10.10.195, new: 10.10.10.19

Changes:
 - changed needle to be: "node-%s " in order to correctly match IP addresses.

Testing:
 - Validated change with some sample code and test input file.
 - QA Regression suite.
